alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Chesterfield; Fairfield; Kershaw; Lancaster; Lexington; Newberry; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 1:57PM EST until January 09 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EST FOR FAIRFIELD...LANCASTER...SOUTHEASTERN NEWBERRY...NORTHWESTERN CHESTERFIELD...LEXINGTON...NORTH CENTRAL AIKEN...RICHLAND AND WESTERN KERSHAW COUNTIES... At 157 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Indian Land to 6 miles northwest of Aiken State Park, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Forest Acres, Lancaster, Camden, Batesburg-Leesville, Winnsboro, Springdale, Dentsville, Oak Grove, Lake Wateree Dam, St. Andrews, VC Summer Nuclear Station, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, Indian Land, and Pageland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 29 and 96. Interstate 26 between mile markers 85 and 120. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 51. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central South Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Chesterfield; Fairfield; Kershaw; Lancaster; Lexington; Newberry; Richland
